example1.function_description: A regular expression pattern that matches any vowel character (a, e, i, o, or u).

example2.function_description: Replaces all occurrences of a specified matching substring within a given full string with another specified substring.

example3.function_description: Replaces the starting character of a word if it matches a specified condition (e.g. is a vowel or consonant) with a given replacement string.
